name: leroymuaythai
description: Richard Leroy muay thai and MMA School

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin about.html -d --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin programs.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/programs.html && usemin schedule.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/schedule.html

author: Dillon Rooke (DRUX.DEV)
